name: Corpse Reviver No. Blue
preparation:
Bacardí brand ambassador Jacob Briars created this drink as a joke, but it’s become a popular order, so he gets the last laugh. It is similar to the Corpse Reviver No. 2, but swaps Cointreau for blue curaçao.

Rinse a chilled coupe or Martini glass with absinthe and set aside.

Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker with ice, and shake until chilled.

Fine-strain into the prepared glass, and garnish with a lemon peel.
